task.summary: restructured figures for paper for Dora

expression.expression-string: print pd.DataFrame(data=np.vstack((p_BpD_BmD_ttest, p_B_NB_ttest, p_BpD_BmD_kruskal, p_B_NB_kruskal, mean_BpD, mean_BmD, mean_B, mean_NB, std_BpD, std_BmD, std_B, std_NB)), columns=['ISI hist. peak', 'Width ISI hist.', 'Fraction ISIs < 8ms', 'Fraction 8ms < ISIs < 25ms', 'Mean 10% shortest ISIs', 'CV ISIs', 'Fraction ISI[n] or ISI[n+1] < 8ms', 'Fraction single spikes', 'Firing rate', 'Linear slope before AP'], index=['p(B+D, B-D) t-test', 'p(B, NB) t-test', 'p(B+D, B-D) kruskal', 'p(B, NB) kruskal', 'mean(B+D)', 'mean(B-D)', 'mean(B)', 'mean(NB)', 'std(B+D)', 'std(B-D)', 'std(B)', 'std(NB)'])
pl.figure() pl.hist(statistic, bins=50, color='0.5') pl.axvline(np.abs(fun(x, y)[0]), color='r') pl.show()

print pd.DataFrame(data=np.vstack((p_BpD_BmD_ttest, p_B_NB_ttest, p_BpD_BmD_kruskal, p_B_NB_kruskal, mean_BpD, mean_BmD, mean_B, mean_NB, std_BpD, std_BmD, std_B, std_NB)).T, columns=['ISI hist. peak', 'Width ISI hist.', 'Fraction ISIs < 8ms', 'Fraction 8ms < ISIs < 25ms', 'Mean 10% shortest ISIs', 'CV ISIs', 'Fraction ISI[n] or ISI[n+1] < 8ms', 'Fraction single spikes', 'Firing rate', 'Linear slope before AP'], index=['p(B+D, B-D) t-test', 'p(B, NB) t-test', 'p(B+D, B-D) kruskal', 'p(B, NB) kruskal', 'mean(B+D)', 'mean(B-D)', 'mean(B)', 'mean(NB)', 'std(B+D)', 'std(B-D)', 'std(B)', 'std(NB)'])
np.vstack((p_BpD_BmD_ttest, p_B_NB_ttest, p_BpD_BmD_kruskal, p_B_NB_kruskal, mean_BpD, mean_BmD, mean_B, mean_NB, std_BpD, std_BmD, std_B, std_NB))
